description: Deliciously crunchy air fryer chickpeas. A healthy, protein-packed vegan snack with a bit of spice that is super quick and easy!
keywords: Indian curry,Pescatarian,Air fryer,Seafood free,Gluten free,Tree nut free,Egg free,Sesame free,Halal,Quick & easy dinner,Soy free,Wheat free,Vegetarian,Vegan,Dairy free,Peanut free
name: Crunchy Curry Chickpeas Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Wash and drain canned chickpeas in a colander. Try to remove as much excess water as possible to help maximise their crunchiness.
Place the chickpeas in a bowl. Drizzle olive oil all over the chickpeas and mix through.
Add a tablespoon of curry powder and mix through the chickpeas. Add more or less curry powder depending on your preference for spice level and flavour.
Add salt and pepper (optional), and mix through.
Put the chickpeas through an air fryer for 15 mins at 200Â°C.
